name: Volpe
description:
The Adventures of Volpe, an Isometric game where you take on the Undead as the masked warrior, Volpe. Hack, slash, and shoot through ghosts and skeletons till you've finally put the dead to rest for the last time.

WASD to move, left and right mouse buttons to attack.

Credits:

Caleb Carreon - Programmer / Systems Designer

Sam Olson - Game Artist / Level Designer

Layne Chant -  Programmer

Brett Levinson - Level Designer
